patthana15.30:4.1: Lokiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.30:5.1: Lokiyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.30:6.1: Lokiyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nalokiyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
